headline: The Boeing Company’s (BA) 777-9 Flight Training Simulators Receives Qualification Certification
summary: The Boeing Company (NYSE:BA) is one of the Best Aerospace and Defense Stocks to Invest In Right Now. On February 19, The Boeing Company (NYSE:BA) announced that its 777-9 flight training simulators received qualification certificates from the US Federal Aviation Administration and European Union Aviation Safety Agency. This brings the simulators a step closer to […]

headline: BAE Systems Electromagnetic Attack Breakthrough And What It May Mean For BA
summary: BAE Systems (LSE:BA) has worked with the U.S. Air Force on a new modular electromagnetic attack system. The company recently showed the system operating across different defense platforms using rapid prototyping. The technology is designed to be customizable and relatively affordable for a range of electronic warfare applications. BAE Systems is a major defense technology supplier, with electronic warfare a key part of its portfolio alongside combat aircraft systems, cyber, and intelligence...
